product_name: TYR Happy Fish Silicone Swim Cap - Kids'
long_description: The Tyr Happy Fish silicone swim cap is more than just a fun fashion statement. It's engineered to help increase swimming speed and provide protection from damaging chlorine. Precision fit reduces drag and offers tear resistance; cap is made to slide on easily and stay on. The Tyr Happy Fish Silicone swim cap features durable color and a playful design for the water.
short_description: The Tyr Happy Fish silicone swim cap is more than just a fun fashion statement. It's engineered to help increase swimming speed and provide protection from damaging chlorine.
